definition: to neglect the root and pursue the tip (idiom)/to neglect fundamentals and concentrate on details
residence
old variant of 捨|舍[she3]
surname She
to give up/to abandon/to give alms
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
to pursue/to chase/individually/one by one
tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man

sentences.english: It's also likely that the whole thing will be a boondoggle.
sentences.chinese: 也有可能整个行动会是一种舍本逐末的做法。

sentences.english: I think that they are not worth the candle.
sentences.chinese: 我认为他们是舍本逐末。

sentences.english: Who cares? What was she doing out of the kitchen?!
sentences.chinese: 再者，这怎么就是舍本逐末了？

sentences.english: Many people today are trying to put the cart before the horse.
sentences.chinese: 今天很多人都在舍本逐末。

definition: lit. to invert root and branch (idiom); fig. confusing cause and effect/to stress the incidental over the fundamental/to put the cart before the horse
lit. climb a tree to catch a fish (idiom); fig. to attempt the impossible
to let go of the big prize while grabbing at trifles (idiom)
pinyin: jian3 le5 zhi1 ma5 diu1 le5 xi1 gua1

definition: seeking instant benefit (idiom); shortsighted vision, looking only for fast return
to buy a wooden box and return the pearls inside/to show poor judgment (idiom)
blindly/invariably
to spoil things through excessive enthusiasm (idiom)
anxious for quick results (idiom); to demand instant success/impatient for result/impetuous
twice the effort for half the result
lit. to want sth in haste, but cannot get there (idiom, from Analects); more haste, less speed/also written 欲速則不達|欲速则不达
to lack foresight
lit. eyes obscured by a single leaf (idiom)/fig. not seeing the wider picture/can't see the wood for the trees
careless/any-old-how, regardless of the specific task
pinyin: mei2 mao5 hu2 zi5 yi1 ba3 zhua1

definition: to try to draw a tiger but end up with a likeness of a dog (idiom)/to try to do sth overambitious and end up botching it
pinyin: hua4 hu3 bu4 cheng2 fan3 lei4 quan3

definition: to copy the way they walk in Handan (idiom)/slavishly copying others, one risks becoming a caricature
lit. to drain the pond to get at the fish (idiom)/fig. to kill the goose that lays the golden eggs
